  /**

  offset: PropTypes /* @typescript-to-proptypes-ignore */.oneOfType([PropTypes.string, PropTypes.number, PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.oneOfType([PropTypes.string, PropTypes.number])), PropTypes.object]),
